nodes.text: UnderWorld was a roleplaying-game adventure in the Living Force campaign. It was episode three of the Between the Worlds trilogy of adventures set in the first year of the campaign. It was written by Morrie Mullins.

In the first two adventures of the trilogy, the heroes were hired by criminal kingpin Nirama to infiltrate the Cell, a splinter group within his organization. In this adventure, the Cell secretly contacts the heroes, claiming to be agents for Nirama, and instruct them to eliminate key members of his organization. They travel to Rothe Gate, an industrial asteroid. The heroes realize the subterfuge when Nirama arrives on Rothe Gate, and they have to decide how to resolve the situation.
